Hi,
I have a data grid with 3 columns. All three are template columns with my own usercontrol (derived from TextBox) in it. Now if I navigate with tab everything is fine, but if I am on column3 and press SHIFT-Tab to get back to column 2, i get the below exception. What can I do to prevent this?

Added: actually, i get this exception always if I try to navigate from one cell to the other in the selected row by either hittin tab, shift-tab, or mouse-click.
Are you using a BindingListCollectionView as your source?  If so, this is a known issue that will be addressed in the v1 release.
